txt.en: Dís has long tended the ravens that still dwell in the heights of Ravenhill, but the once-strong friendship between the ravens and Durin's Folk has faded nearly to naught.

'These will do.

'I cannot say if the ravens will appreciate these offerings, but it does not harm us to try.

'Thank you, [placeholder].'

Trinkets are carried by many of the Jangovar in the North.\n\nDís has suggested that renewing the old practice of offering shiny trinkets to the ravens might aid in rebuilding a friendship between Durin's Folk and their kind.
Dís can be found at Ravenhill.\n\nYou have gathered many trinkets from the Jangovar and should now deliver them to Dís.
Collected Jangovar trinkets for the ravens of Ravenhill ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Deliver the trinkets to Dís at Ravenhill
Collect Jangovar trinkets for the ravens of Ravenhill ([placeholder]/[placeholder])

'You are back again?

'If you wish to bring me more of the Jangovar's baubles, I will not turn you away. The ravens seem intrigued, but they have remained silent.

'Bring me those trinkets, and we shall see if the ravens still desire friendship with Durin's Folk.'
